text: E re: “Ke mang ea le bolokileng ka bophelo ho tsoa marung ekasitana le lefats’eng, kapa eo eleng eena Mong`a kutlo le pono; le ea khutlisetsang tse phelang ho tse shoeleng le ho khutlisesta tse shoeleng ho tse phelang; ea bileng a laolang mabaka ohle?” Ba tla re: “Ke Allah.” E re: “joale hobaneng le sa boloke ts’ebeletso ea lona malebana le eena
